tasks.task: Understanding the historical evolution of dogs in agriculture
subtasks: Learning about the relationship between dogs and human agriculture over thousands of years
Recognizing the initial roles of dogs in hunting and gathering
Acknowledging the shift in dog roles as human societies settled
Identifying herding breeds and their efficiency in livestock management
Recognizing terriers' role in pest control and crop protection
Understanding guardian dogs' function in protecting livestock from predators
Appreciating the bond between farmers and dogs and its impact on productivity

tasks.task: Appreciating the adaptability of working dogs in modern farming
subtasks: Noting the continued critical roles of working dogs in agriculture today
Acknowledging dogs' ability to adapt to modern farming needs
Recognizing the global importance of working dogs on homesteads
